review: 4 stars because whenever I use this with my computer, sleep mode seems to effect it even though I downloaded recommended app to disable sleep mode.  When using my iPhone 4 with You Tube it works the best.  My main use for Chromecast is for streaming You Tube on my Samsung smart TV for my son's cartoon viewing.  Don't know if it works for other tv's but when I start Chromecast, TV will automatically turn on and change to Chromecast viewing and I am able to use Samsung remote's play and pause videos which is nice since I usually am playing a game, so I don't have to switch over to YouTube if my son wants to pause.  And bad is it only works with certain apps (Chromecast doesn't work with Youtube views on safari for example).
author: BigBoy
